name: Beginners Fishing Pole
description: A relatively pitiful fishing pole, made from a piece of string and a stick.

name: Wooden Fishing Pole
description: An upgrade, with a make-shift reel and line.

name: Plastic-like Fishing Pole
description: A strangely flimsy, mass produced, but sturdier fishing pole. Much easier and faster to cast.

name: Iron Fishing Pole
description: A fishing pole made of iron, allowing it to be thinner and sturdier. Bigger fish, faster.

name: Steel Fishing Pole
description: This pole can take the largest of normal beasts.

name: Diamond Fishing Pole
description: Able to resist breaking under the strongest fish, this pole is envied by all hobbyists.

name: Manyllyn Pole
description: Can land even the Water Beasts from the Southern Lakes.

name: Basic Net
description: Utilized in boat missions, this is sure to get you a lot of, even if small, good fish.

name: Reinforced Net
description: This, paired with a high grade net caster, can catch Water Beasts in large amounts. Reeling in the cash now, aren't we?
